messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I actually need some help with my order. I want to change the shipping address for my laptop order to my NYC address, but I don't want to share the full address here. Also, I want to modify the laptop specs to have an i5 processor, 256GB SSD storage, and space grey color. Additionally, I want to exchange my watch to have a black dial color but keep the leather strap. Can you help me with these changes?

Additionally, I want to exchange my watch to have a black dial color but keep the leather strap. Can you help me with these changes?
